meanings.sent1: The movie had an ironier ending than I expected.
meanings.sent2: Her sarcastic comments made her even ironier than usual.
meanings.sent3: It was ironier than a rainstorm on a sunny day.
meanings.sent4: His smile was as ironier as a clown at a funeral.
meanings.sent5: The irony in her tone was so ironier, it was hard to miss.

meanings.sent1: The situation became even ironier when he showed up late.
meanings.sent2: Her choice of words couldn't have been ironier.
meanings.sent3: It was ironier than finding a snowman in the desert.
meanings.sent4: The twist in the story was as ironier as a plot twist in a soap opera.
meanings.sent5: The irony in his actions was so ironier, it left everyone speechless.
